### Some Highlights:


#### [EAlidaR](https://github.com/h-a-graham/EAlidaR) 
An R package to download EA LiDAR composite data for England

#### [rayvista](https://github.com/h-a-graham/rayvista) 
An R package to make create 3D scenes anywhere in the world using {rayshader}

#### [sfm_precision](https://github.com/exeter-creww/SFM_Precision/tree/master/sfm_precision)
A python module for Agisoft Metashpae to carry out precision analysis as originally proposed in [James, et al. (2017)](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/esp.4125) but with all calculations done within Metashape/python.

#### [sfm_gridz](https://github.com/exeter-creww/SFM_Precision/tree/master/sfm_gridz)
A python package to conduct robust raster-based change detection analysis with consideration of sfm precision derived in from the sfm_precision Metashape python module

#### [Beaver Hydrological Impacts](https://github.com/h-a-graham/Budleigh_Brook_Beaver_Hydro)
A reproducible data analysis workflow to quantify the impact of beaver dams on stream flows using a BACI experimental design.

#### [beavertools](https://github.com/h-a-graham/beavertools) 
An R package to map and model the expansion of beaver populations
